e3d7e02826b34ad0ff593bb5568c28cd1eabfcaf.commitMessage: Issue #4947: split illegalClassNames for IllegalType for short names

a963f8a21bd47624ec9f1eea72c9326e2ca01c8a.commitMessage: Issue #3255: removed unnecessary string fields for patterns

91a49a90d40c6adad5f973f792c6b80003a69263.commitMessage: Issue #2451: removed excess hierarchy from IllegalTypeCheck

1c42e3eeb9aeebc47b2373541c1cc8d311d8b671.commitMessage: Fix PMD violations from 'strings' ruleset, issue #873

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

b06e2e0015944ceaa74a10134bf06ac5c9e53782.commitMessage: Illegal Type Check, fixed false positives on same file names, added support of analyzing imports, issue #78

ea4085cd15fefe1e70a495798187c425295c74b6.commitMessage:
Fix for rfe 1248106 (TYPECAST is now accepted by NoWhitespaceAfter)

Fix for rfe 953266 (thanks to Paul Guyot (pguyot) for submitting patch)
IllegalType can be configured to accept some abstract classes which
matches to regexp of illegal type names (property legalAbstractClassNames)

TrailingComment now can be configured to accept some trailing comments
(such as NOI18N) (property legalComment, rfe 1385344).
